title: Vayushastra Aerospace Ed-Tech - STEM Workshops
short_description: Delivered 50+ STEM workshops reaching over 1,000 students from underserved communities
full_description: Delivered 50+ STEM workshops reaching over 1,000 students from underserved communities from grades 6-9. Created syllabi for aeronautics, mathematics, physics, machine learning and AI lessons. Integrated storytelling into lessons to enhance engagement. Designed curriculum and assessments now adopted across the organization. Focus on basic science rooted in aeronautics and aerospace, combined with hands-on science model-making activities embedded in mythological sci-fi stories.
highlights: Created curriculum for aeronautics, ML, AI
